name: Splashy Cube: Color Run
description:
Embark on an exciting adventure through colorful labyrinth. Check this most colorful block vs ball game!

Roll the block through space and avoid balls trying to stop you. Keep on rollin’!
Complete colorful levels and master your skills through experience.

How to play:
* Tap left or right to move
* Splash balls in the same color,
* Avoid balls in a different colors,
* Don’t touch the spikes (ouch!) and try not to fall in the gaps,
* Reach the end of the labyrinth to progress

Easy to learn controls. Beautiful and colorful visuals.
